org.mongodb.connection

Interface AsyncServerConnection

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AsyncConnection, BaseConnection

    @NotThreadSafe
public interface AsyncServerConnection
extends AsyncConnection
    A server-aware asynchronous connection, from which clients can retrieve the description of the server to which it is connected.
    Since:
    3.0

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ServerDescription getDescription()
      Gets the description of the server that this is a connection to.

        receiveMessage, sendMessage

      • Methods inherited from interface org.mongodb.connection.BaseConnection

        close, getServerAddress, isClosed
